explains: n. 功能；[数] 泛函性，函数性

sentences.en: It is significantly more compact than any comparable laptop, with no loss in functionality.
sentences.cn: 它比其它任何一台同类的笔记本电脑都更便于携带，并且在功能性上无任何差别。

sentences.en: As always, the unit tests for that class should capture the functionality for each of its methods.
sentences.cn: 像往常那样，该类的单元测试应该捕获其每个方法的功能。

sentences.en: Decisions about where functionality will be implemented, in hardware, software, or workers have not yet been made.
sentences.cn: 关于在何处实现功能的决定，是在硬件、软件还是工作人员中，都还没有做出。
